function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inefficient mechanical ventilation systems leading to the spread of airborne infections","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne infection transmission","Mitigation":"Upgrade mechanical ventilation systems or implement alternative air disinfection methods","Technologies":"Mechanical ventilation systems, upper room GUV, room air cleaners","People":"Occupants of buildings with inefficient ventilation systems","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Inadequate surface disinfection in unoccupied rooms","Impact":"Risk of cross-contamination when admitting new patients","Mitigation":"Implement effective surface disinfection methods such as upper room GUV","Technologies":"Upper room GUV, high-intensity UV","People":"Healthcare facility staff, new patients","Owner":"Healthcare facility management"},{"Description":"Limited exposure time of microbes to upper room GUV","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of upper room GUV in decontaminating room air","Mitigation":"Ensure effective mixing of room air to maximize exposure time to upper room GUV","Technologies":"Ceiling fans, ventilation diffusers, air temperature gradients","People":"Occupants of rooms with limited air mixing","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"}]}
